version_description:
* PBS content now available in iOS Spotlight Search for iOS 9!
* reduced size of app since last update
* minor bug fixes

* PBS content now available in iOS Spotlight Search for iOS 9!
* reduced size of app since last update
* minor bug fixes

A completely redesigned interface to make finding and watching the shows you love even easier. Including...
- Simplified Browse page for easily finding shows
- Updated Shows page to explore PBS shows by genre
- Improved station screen to help you connect with and support your local PBS station
- Improved video playback
- Bug fixes

A completely redesigned interface to make finding and watching the shows you love even easier. Including...
- Simplified Browse page for easily finding shows
- Updated Shows page to explore PBS shows by genre
- Improved station screen to help you connect with and support your local PBS station
- Improved video playback
- Bug fixes

- Fix for Chromecast not working for some users with Passport videos
- Fix for multiple closed caption issues when using Chromecast

Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Fix for "Resume Watching" feature
Fix for "Resume Watching" feature

What’s new:
- Browse through episodes faster with shows organized by seasons
- Watch a preview for the next episode before you dive in with a “preview” button on videos
- Explore new themed collections within select shows
- New “Spotlight” collection on the homescreen highlights popular new videos
- “My Videos” page now includes your favorite shows
- Each show will now feature similar shows you might also like

What’s improved:
- Row titles are now tappable to see all the content within that section
- Improved video labels include video type, season, and more

What’s new:
- Browse through episodes faster with shows organized by seasons
- Watch a preview for the next episode before you dive in with a “preview” button on videos
- Explore new themed collections within select shows
- New “Spotlight” collection on the homescreen highlights popular new videos
- “My Videos” page now includes your favorite shows
- Each show will now feature similar shows you might also like

What’s improved:
- Row titles are now tappable to see all the content within that section
- Improved video labels include video type, season, and more

Fixed: A bug for some you that upgraded from an old version where you were not logged in. We were unable to identify your local station and manually selecting it wasn’t working. Sorry about all of that! The app should auto-localize you just fine now.

Fixed: A Chromecast bug where some of you would hear audio but would not see video after sponsorship messages played. You should now both hear AND SEE your videos, which we think is a much better experience.

What’s new:
- Browse through episodes faster with shows organized by seasons
- Watch a preview for the next episode before you dive in with a “preview” button on videos
- Explore new themed collections within select shows
- New “Spotlight” collection on the homescreen highlights popular new videos
- “My Videos” page now includes your favorite shows
- Each show will now feature similar shows you might also like

What’s improved:
- Row titles are now tappable to see all the content within that section
- Improved video labels include video type, season, and more

Fixed: A bug for some you that upgraded from an old version where you were not logged in. We were unable to identify your local station and manually selecting it wasn’t working. Sorry about all of that! The app should auto-localize you just fine now.

Fixed: A Chromecast bug where some of you would hear audio but would not see video after sponsorship messages played. You should now both hear AND SEE your videos, which we think is a much better experience.

What’s new:
- Browse through episodes faster with shows organized by seasons
- Watch a preview for the next episode before you dive in with a “preview” button on videos
- Explore new themed collections within select shows
- New “Spotlight” collection on the homescreen highlights popular new videos
- “My Videos” page now includes your favorite shows
- Each show will now feature similar shows you might also like

What’s improved:
- Row titles are now tappable to see all the content within that section
- Improved video labels include video type, season, and more

- Finally added the ability to pause or exit playback during sponsorship messages ("ads"). Sorry that took so long. Thanks for all of the feedback.
- Fixed multiple Chromecast playback issues (more fixes are coming soon)
- Fixed an occasional crash when tapping the “Preview” button on video screens
- Fixed an issue with the closed captioning (CC) control being disabled based on iOS system settings
- Fixed an issue with duplicated videos showing up on some collection screens
- Fixed an issue where an empty "More Episodes" row appeared on some video screens
- Fixed some season links/images that did not go to the seasons picker screen
- Added the app version in the settings section
- Several other small UI fixes

- Finally added the ability to pause or exit playback during sponsorship messages ("ads"). Sorry that took so long. Thanks for all of the feedback.
- Fixed multiple Chromecast playback issues (more fixes are coming soon)
- Fixed an occasional crash when tapping the “Preview” button on video screens
- Fixed an issue with the closed captioning (CC) control being disabled based on iOS system settings
- Fixed an issue with duplicated videos showing up on some collection screens
- Fixed an issue where an empty "More Episodes" row appeared on some video screens
- Fixed some season links/images that did not go to the seasons picker screen
- Added the app version in the settings section
- Several other small UI fixes

- Fix for some partially watched videos playing from the beginning on Chromecast

- Update to use newest version of Google Sign In

- Update to remove empty show seasons when browsing
- Updated keyboard type for sign-in on tablets
- Fix for favorite shows not showing up immediately when added for some users

- Update to remove empty show seasons when browsing
- Updated keyboard type for sign-in on tablets
- Fix for favorite shows not showing up immediately when added for some users
- Fix for Facebook login issues
- Fixes for multiple app crashes
- Other minor fixes

* White Apple “Home” bar at the bottom of the screen during video playback is now hidden
* Fixed an issue that would cause some videos not to play or load slowly on some attempts
* Fixed issue with some items resizing incorrectly when changing iPad orientation
* Fixed issue where some users are periodically signed out
* Fixed several issues with Chromecast playback controls
* Fixed multiple issues when adding/removing favorite shows and videos
* Fixed occasional app crashes on various screens
* Fixed incorrect error message when trying to sign up with an existing email address

* White Apple “Home” bar at the bottom of the screen during video playback is now hidden
* Fixed an issue that would cause some videos not to play or load slowly on some attempts
* Fixed issue with some items resizing incorrectly when changing iPad orientation
* Fixed issue where some users are periodically signed out
* Fixed several issues with Chromecast playback controls
* Fixed multiple issues when adding/removing favorite shows and videos
* Fixed occasional app crashes on various screens
* Fixed incorrect error message when trying to sign up with an existing email address

* Fixed an app crash when internet connectivity is lost during playback
* Updated Google Cast software for iOS 13 compatibility
Note: This version does not support Chromecast's bluetooth "guest mode"

* Fixed an app crash when internet connectivity is lost during playback
* Updated Google Cast software for iOS 13 compatibility
Note: This version does not support Chromecast's bluetooth "guest mode"

* Added links on videos and seasons back to their parent show
* Added links to improved TV station schedules
* Fixed multiple display issues when in iOS 13 Dark Mode
* Fixed broken "Collection" links on show screens
* Fix issues with multiple sponsorship videos being played when resuming app after screen lock
* Fixed incorrect messages when trying to recreate an existing account
* Fixed broken link to PBS help site
* Fixed delay when returning to app after stopping Chromecast playback

* Added links on videos and seasons back to their parent show
* Added links to improved TV station schedules
* Fixed multiple display issues when in iOS 13 Dark Mode
* Fixed broken "Collection" links on show screens
* Fix issues with multiple sponsorship videos being played when resuming app after screen lock
* Fixed incorrect messages when trying to recreate an existing account
* Fixed broken link to PBS help site
* Fixed delay when returning to app after stopping Chromecast playback
PBS has a brand new look! We’ve launched a refreshed brand and updated colors, fonts, and the look-and-feel used throughout the app.
PBS has a brand new look! We’ve launched a refreshed brand and updated colors, fonts, and the look-and-feel used throughout the app.

* Expanded screen space on notched devices & removed white bar at bottom of screen
* “Preview Preview” and “Play Episode” buttons now appear on related videos
* Fixed an issue where partially watched videos may resume from the wrong point
* Fixed invisible text in search field when in dark mode
* Fixed multiple layout bugs on tablets when changing orientation
* Fixed issue where some videos may fail to play after ads
* Fixed multiple app crashes/freezes

* Expanded screen space on notched devices & removed white bar at bottom of screen
* “Preview Preview” and “Play Episode” buttons now appear on related videos
* Fixed an issue where partially watched videos may resume from the wrong point
* Fixed invisible text in search field when in dark mode
* Fixed multiple layout bugs on tablets when changing orientation
* Fixed issue where some videos may fail to play after ads
* Fixed multiple app crashes/freezes

- Updated "Watchlist" and "Favorite Shows" to "My List - Videos" and "My List - Shows"
- Fixed several issues causing app crashes

- Updated "Watchlist" and "Favorite Shows" to "My List - Videos" and "My List - Shows"
- Fixed several issues causing app crashes

Features a new and persistent navigation menu. Users can now access "Home", "Shows", "Search", "My List", and "My Station" easily within the app.
Features a new and persistent navigation menu. Users can now access "Home", "Shows", "Search", "My List", and "My Station" easily within the app.
Fix for occasional app crashes when resetting the password associated with a PBS account.
Fix for occasional app crashes when resetting the password associated with a PBS account.

Improved video player:
- Added skip forward/back buttons
- Added volume controls
- Added AirPlay controls
- Larger buttons for easy touch controls
- Updated Chromecast playback controls
- Improved Chromecast reliability
Note: The Chromecast button is no longer available in the video player, but is still accessible from the top header in the app.

Improved video player:
- Added skip forward/back buttons
- Added volume controls
- Added AirPlay controls
- Larger buttons for easy touch controls
- Updated Chromecast playback controls
- Improved Chromecast reliability
Note: The Chromecast button is no longer available in the video player, but is still accessible from the top header in the app.
